Thank you again for hosting our guys they enjoyed it!!
Neighbor dogs just barking annoying. Other than that everything was good. Thank you.

Relaxing space, comfortable bed, very clean and peaceful.

Great place close to school, plenty of parking.

Everything is perfect, nice place and everything is very clean and it's like in the photos

A great place to stay in Enid. Comfortable beds, great amenities and a quality desk and chair to get some work done.
Had a great stay here! The home was very nice!
The grandkids loved the place!! Fenced backyard was perfect for the littles to burn off energy!! Close to the places we needed to go!
It was a comfy house easy to check in and Pam was very responsive I would stay in it again next time I vist.
If I’m ever in Enid again I will be staying again love the place

great place
This was our second time at Pam’s place and we loved it just as much. Great walkability to things, very clean, and the perfect place for our Enid visit!
What a wonderful place to stay! My friend and I felt right at home and loved every minute of our stay. I travel to this area frequently and will definitely book again!
Pam was an excellent host. Her home is quaint and was relaxing to stay in. We were able to bring our dog and he loved the use of yard. We will definitely book Pam’s place again.

Pam was nice and communicated well. Enid is small so location is pretty central, but to be honest we did not enjoy our stay. We were skeptical upon pulling into neighborhood. Very run down area. The outer appearance was quite concerning. There were three cars parked in drive next to home. Inside was clean, but very old. Furnace does not heat bedrooms unless doors are left open. The furniture felt like sitting on plywood. The beds were comfortable, but they were so squeaky I thought I was going to wake my baby every time I moved. The shower is tiny! You couldn’t turn around without opening the curtain. I’m not trying to be rude. Like I said, Pam was a good host, but the home does not meet rental standards, in my opinion. We would not recommend or return.

Charming old home, clearly remodeled and excellently done. Very detail oriented and kind host. Cozy atmosphere.
Found a couple nails poking out of the floor in front bedroom so something to be mindful of if you stay here. It is an old home.
Loved how easy the process was from the beginning and how responsive Pam was whenever I had any questions.
Pam’s place was great! Very clean, comfy beds, and great communication with our host. Will definitely stay again!
Great place to stay

Cute & comfy! Worked so well for our family of 4 plus 2 doggos. Clean, comfy beds - we often kept the sofa pulled out so it was a big lounge sofa! Pam has done a great job with an older house, setting it up to be such a relaxing spot to come home to after a day out.
Nice home and host
Everything good.
this place made us feel right at home! we loved using the beautiful kitchen and enjoyed the cozy living spaces. There were comfortable beds and the neighborhood was peaceful to walk in.

Pam’s place was a great place to stay for our trip to Enid. We were close to everything. There was plenty of equipment in the kitchen to prepare simple meals. The beds were comfortable. We would stay again.

We were very comfortable and enjoyed our stay. I was impressed with how quickly Pam got back to me when the door wouldn’t lock as we were leaving the first time. (We pushed the Yale button as directed, and waited to hear the locking mechanism. It took several tries, but it finally locked.) Pam checked in with me before arrival, during our stay, and after we checked out. Super helpful and accommodating! Excellent host!

This is an older home that made me feel right at home! Wanted a place to get my mom out of her normal surroundings and this was great! She came over to visit and loved it! Only a few minutes from my mom's house so the back and forth wasn't bad at all. Pam responded quickly, no matter the time of day. She communicated very well. The decor was great, the atmosphere. My pet ended up not coming but he would have loved the back yard. This place owes us nothing except to be available next time we visit! Thanks again Pam!

Great house to stay in while in Enid. Right across from the High School which worked out great for us as we were attending a football game.
Neighborhood was quiet and we had no issues at all with the house. We would definitely stay here again on our next visit to Enid!
Clean, convenient location, Pam was super quick responding to messages. House is exactly as described, small and comfy.
Very warm and welcoming home. I enjoyed my stay.
Great value

This place was great! I stayed for 2 weeks during a transition period and loved it. The house is so cozy and makes you feel right at home. Pam even did a grocery order for some supplies to make sure I had everything I needed!
Great place! The bed is so comfortable and the location is safe.
Great host & great place to stay.

Pam’s house was the perfect place for me to stay while I was in town visiting family. It is an older house in an older neighborhood, but Pam has fixed up the interior of her house and it was very welcoming. The window a/c units kept the house plenty cool in the Oklahoma summer heat. Every amenity needed was in the kitchen, plenty of towels in the bathroom, and lots of fluffy pillows on the beds. Next time I travel to Enid, I’ll be sure to check to see if this home is available for me to stay in.
Great place! Easy check in, comfortable and and clean.

Older home in older neighborhood but both were clean and safe. Very close to Enid high school. I was initially concerned when I saw there were windows air conditioning units (it was 103 degrees outside when I arrived!) but there was a unit in almost every room and the house was very comfortable. Loved the claw foot bath tub! Bed was very comfortable. Kitchen has a few older home “quirks” like oddly placed switches and plug ins, but easily figured out. Pam super friendly and responsive to all my questions.
We stayed while waiting for housing at Vance AFB, and it was just what we were looking for!

This was the perfect house for our stay in Enid for two couples. It was quiet with empty lots on two sides. Two driveways made it easy to park our two vehicles. The house was clean and comfortable. Pam was super responsive and we’d definitely recommend staying here.
Great host, clean house.

Pam’s place was great. There are no neighbors on her side of the street. It’s very quiet and peaceful.
Pam was very helpful.

They have made a older home very quaint and updated. It was quiet and easy off a main road and down the road from the police station. It was perfect for us with our 2 little dogs and look forward to using them in the future.

I highly recommend staying.
Reasonable quality at a reasonable price
Nice clean, little house. Ac works good. And beds were very comfortable.
Pam's place was clean and comfortable. I had questions about products in the home due to allergies, and she was responsive and thorough in her answers.
Pam's place was simple, clean, well-kept, great location, and inexpensive. Communication was great. Just what we wanted, and would definitely stay there again.
Nice little house in the middle of Enid. Easy to find. Was a great stay for myself and my coworker while working in Enid.

Pam's place was perfect for what we needed. We were in town for business and was able to bring our dog with us. The back yard was great for our dog to exercise in a fenced in area. The neighborhood was quiet even during school hours (high school next door). We were never disturbed. Communication was amazing and any questions we had were answered. Definitely recommend and will stay here again!!
Comfortable stay, quiet neighborhood.

Had a great stay everything we needed.
Had a last minute change on dates and Pam worked with us and made it very easy.

Comfortable home with everything we needed for our stay. We had to unexpectedly make the trip to Enid and found the home just as listed and in great condition. When we had to extend our stay they were very accommodating. Thank you for helping us during our difficult time.

Pam’s place was perfect! Pam was very responsive and friendly the entire time we stayed. Pam allowed us to check in a little early which worked perfect since we brought our baby along. We made the mistake of not following the instructions when leaving the house and Pam had her aunt come help within 30 minutes. Her aunt was just as friendly and made sure we got back in the house even though it was late. We enjoyed the cozy living area and kitchen! Everything was clean and exactly as advertised. We will definitely be staying at Pam’s place the next time we are in Enid. Thank you Pam for your amazing hospitality!

This place was great. We felt safe as this house is by itself, but near a high school with a lighted parking lot. We were able to walk on the track at the high school. The bed was very comfortable and we would stay again.
Pam’s place was perfect for our little family. She made sure to have the heat on for us as we were arriving late. Great communication and a great price as well.
Cute little house in the middle of town.
Very cozy and well furnished home, absolutely loved my stay!

On a recent visit to Enid, we stayed at Pam's cute home. It was perfect for us. We were in town for activities at Vance AFB and Pam's place is very convenient to the base. During downtime, Pam's place was the perfect place to relax, fix a meal and chill. Pam's place is also convenient to the rest of Enid. We enjoyed visiting the park and seeing the wonderful Christmas decorations. If you are in Enid for activities at Vance AFB or just passing through, I highly recommend staying at Pam's bungalow.
Place was great for my Thanksgiving visit with immediate family
Cozy, amazing stay! I would recommend!!!
This cute house is a great value in a good location. exceptional bedding.

Everything was exactly as described. The house is a neat little place in a very quiet part of town. It was exceptionally nice of the host to allow us to use the garage that was not technically included in the listing. It was a great stay!
So cute and very clean. It was close to stores and food. The perfect house to have a sister’s vacation!
We enjoyed our stay in Pam’s home. It was in the perfect location close to everything. Clean, comfortable, and stocked with everything you need. We will definitely stay again!
Pam is a great host we had absolutely no issues getting in, everything was clean it’s a very cozy place we loved it and hope to stay every time we visit our family in Enid ❤️

Great place to stay in Enid! A quaint little bungalow, beautifully furnished with everything you need!

Overall, this was a great stay. It was close to everything and felt super safe. It is right by the school, so if you come during the week just be warned that you will be awakened by the marching band lol. The house is pretty old and it shows. There’s no central air nor any fans in the bedrooms, so just be prepared that it will be a bit hot when you get there. Could use a little renovation, but overall I liked the house!
what a great space!
Great home for the price! Cute house, has everything needed for a long stay, very communicative host. Will stay again if I visit Enid. :)
Quiet, clean place to stay.
Seriously one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept in! Great host and the house was perfect

This place was well worth the price and convenience to the downtown area was a bonus. the house itself was great but the ONLY negative was inconsiderate, noisy neighbors which you can't always help. highly recommend though. 5 stars!

Overall a good experience. Initial trouble getting in but Chellsie was super responsive. Interior was clean throughout. There was some train noise and industrial noise the first night but fans and air purifier helped mitigate it.

Chellsie was very responsive and helpful - and her place had literally everything you could think of. I was able to comfortably live here for about a month and didn’t need to purchase any soaps/laundry supplies/kitchen items. The place was fully stocked and nicely decorated.
the stay was great. it was peaceful and chellsie was so kind when we needed her help!

Beautiful house near lots of stuff to do and see, very cozy inside and very clean! Would definitely stay again here!!
Great place and host
Very comfortable and cozy airbnb with a great host that puts a lot of effort into the stay! 5 stars!

I had great stay here. The house was really clean. Decorations were super cute. She had everything you needed like toiletries, detergent, and essential things in the kitchen. The bathroom/shower curtains had a weird urine smell. Other than that everything was just about perfect.

This place was exactly what we needed. Small but efficient, super clean, well equipped. Our host was extremely communicative and was quick to provide clarification or assistance as needed. Definitely a 5 star stay! Hands down would recommend it to other couples staying in the area. Will stay again!
Beautiful little house in a quit neighborhood too far from downtown. Host was really flexible and quick to respond when I needed to extend my stay. Would definitely stay again.
Cutest BNB I’ve ever stayed at! Beautifully decorated! Quiet and peaceful! Next time we are in Enid, we will stay there again!

Chelsie is an amazing host! She always responded so quickly and was so helpful. I’m in town for a travel job at the hospital. New to the area. New to Oklahoma.
The house is just what I was looking for, it was perfect. A short, five minute drive to the hospital. Even shorter to the downtown area. Minutes from Callaghan’s, Axe throwing, breweries, Cafe Volare for brunch and Napoli’s for Italian. Less than ten minutes from Walmart and groceries. House is COMPLETELY stocked with dishes, appliances, pots/pans, coffee pot, even a blender for smoothies. Even supplied basic cooking spices, condiments, detergents, ziplocks, trash bags, q-tips… every detail was taken care of. Was easily able to cook full meals. Stepped right into the house and had everything needed to live for weeks.
Gorgeous, magical back yard area. Loved the hanging chair. If visiting from out of town, make sure you visit the event Center a couple miles away, Gloss Mountain and crystal digging at the Salt Plains.

It was nice to find a place like this where so much thought was put into the small details. The thoughtfulness was evident and appreciated. It was a restful place to sleep and settle after a full day. Cute little place with a lot of small things that made it all come together!
Very comfortable and peaceful, felt like home.
Great place to stay! Felt right at home!

Very cute little house.

It was my happy place. :) I will definitely stay at Chellsie’s properties next time I’m in Enid if they are available.

Chelsie got such an amazing abode, I'm very glad I found her place and got to stay in there. the area looks kinda sketch but everyone out there is friendly. and for the price and how close it is to downtown it's a steal. cant wait for my next visit in enid and have her as my host again.
It was a beautifully decorated house. The location was in the central part of town which was very convenient. I really enjoyed my stay!
The home decor was very pleasant. My wife loved it as it matched her colors and preferences.
The house was great to stay at.plenty of lighting in the back yard for a grill out all amenities was great with the house and everything was clean. Very nice place to stay.

This was absolutely our best Airbnb experience. House was immaculately clean and had all of the amenities needed to make you feel at home. Chelsie was a fantastic host. Would recommend to family and friends.
I truly adore this house! A little gem indeed with all of the amenities one could ask for.
Great place to stay in Enid! Chellsie was always very quick to respond to my questions and made it clear that she wanted me to have a comfortable stay!

We were very pleased with our stay. We were only in town for a couple of days for the enid festival, and the airbnb is conveniently located not too far from downtown. We were amazed with the airbnb it was spotless, Chellsie made sure we had everything we needed from toothpicks to complimentary waters. 10/10 experience I would recommend this stay to anyone who wants to visit enid.
Couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay! Thoroughly enjoyed it!!

Wow!!! Cute! Cute! Cute! I went to Enid to have a girls' week with my granddaughters. The house was perfect! It was so clean and well appointed with her decor. The back porch hanging swing was used a lot. The girls asked if we could rent it again! It is our new favorite place to stay in Enid! We will be back!!!!! Thank you so much for all your thoughtful touch. It really made our stay memorable
Great little house! Felt right at home. She had everything you may need plus more! The back patio was comfortable and so cute! Enjoyed my stay

We enjoyed our stay here and Haylee made us feel welcome from day one! We appreciated the spacious rooms and the kids loved the top “bunk” bed. Our kids also enjoyed the tree swing and the park that was a short walk from the property. If the need ever arose, I would definitely stay at this property again!

We enjoyed this little place! It was great for our family and Haylee was super accommodating for our infant. Offering a high chair and pack n play, she even had a bottle brush waiting for us! Highly recommend!
Staying at Haylee’s place was a God send in the middle of a PCS! The kiddos loved all the toys and the bunk. The open concept was so nice, everything was comfortable.
The house was very clean and decorated so cute. Haylee responded quickly to answer my questions. I would definately recommend!

Simply said, everything was perfect! Easy instructions to get in/out, house has been recently renovated and is wonderful, not to mention super clean. Comfortable beds, and so nice to have coffee there for the morning.
Big thanks to Haylee, would highly recommend.
Haylee is quick to responding and very accommodating. Our family had a lovely stay and enjoyed the amenities and thoughtful touches to the home. Would highly recommend
This is my second stay. I'll come back again and again. Everything is 5 star. Centrally located, quiet, comfortable bed, well equipped. The host is friendly and helpful. Highly recommended.

This house was clean and cozy- lots of extra pillows and blankets around. This is a great place for families with young kids- the host had a booster seat ready for my toddler, there is a little shelf full of kids books and toys, and even a sweet little loft bed my preschooler loved exploring. The location is very central to Enid, so convenient to get to restaurant and stores, plus there is a little park with a playground right down the street.

Haylee is a wonderful host! Her place is perfect and we felt right at home. She has many extra touches to make you feel very welcomed. Will definitely be staying here again when visiting family in Enid. Couldn't have been more pleased!

Haylee's place was perfect for a long weekend while attending events on base. The location was perfect and the house had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend others to consider booking here.

We loved staying at this cute little house!
My daughter was so excited when she seen the playhouse in the children's bedroom and they loved the books there too! House was clean and we felt right at home. Definitely would stay here again :)
My family enjoyed staying in this cozy house. It had everything we needed. Haylee gave us such a sweet welcome message for my son’s UPT graduation and made us feel at home.

Loved it. Very clean, cute, and cozy!
The place was just as described. Haylee was very friendly and helpful. Would stay again without hesitations .
Haylee was very accommodating! Nice , cozy , clean and comfortable place . Quiet neighborhood! Everything was great ! Will check into it next time in town !

This is my second time staying! I love how friendly & responsive Haylee is! She will make you feel right at home and suggest many things to do locally if you have some downtime while visiting! I would recommend Haylee to anyone looking for a place to stay while visiting Enid!

If you’re looking to stay at a quaint & personalized pad, try out Haylee’s pad, you just might make it the must-return spot you always hear about.

Great place! Very quiet. Kid friendly!

This place is an absolute gem. We were very comfortable and felt right at home. The park across the street was perfect for our kids. Haylee is excellent with communication and very friendly. We loved our stay!

Many thanks to Haylee for hosting us in Enid. Peaceful home in quiet neighborhood, well-equipped & relaxing. Child-friendly. Would definitely stay again!

This place was adorable and so cozy! We were very comfortable and happy with our stay.

Great place to stay! Haylee has thought out all these little details that make it feel like you have everything you would normally have at home. The place it updated and clean.
